title: New: Shlohmo – Ghost Pt.2 (S. Maharba Remix)
body:
This is the second remix from **S.**

**Maharba** that I’ve posted in as many weeks; the reason for that? He’s fucking awesome. Easily one of my favourite producers around at the moment, this new remix of LA electro-folk artist **Shlohmo** is just another in a long line of refreshingly original pieces. Splicing the track almost beyond recognition, whilst maintaining a downbeat soulful vibe, _Ghost Pt. 2_ may just be the track to soundtrack your New Year. With more material expected in 2012, **S.Maharba** is finally beginning to garner the sort of praise that he has deserved for so long. Check out his version of _Ghost Pt. 2_ below.

 [Shlohmo – Ghosts Pt. 2 (S.Maharba Remix)](http://soundcloud.com/s-maharba/shlohmo-ghosts-pt-2-s-maharba) by [S.Maharba](http://soundcloud.com/s-maharba)
